name: OpenEden
introduce: OpenEden is a smart contract vault managed by a regulated entity to offer 24/7 and direct access to U.S. Treasury Bills. The OpenEden TBILL Vault is a liquid on-chain pool that brings real-world assets into Web3, allowing holders of stablecoins to enjoy sustainable yields. As the first smart contract vault made for U.S. Treasury Bills (“T-Bills”), the OpenEden TBILL Vault provides investors with direct exposure to a pool of short-dated T-Bills via OpenEden’s TBILL token, which is backed 1:1 by the T-Bills as well as USD Coin (“USDC”) and U.S. dollar (“USD”) reserves. TBILL investors will receive a return on their capital that reflects the returns provided by the underlying T-Bills held in a bankruptcy-remote special purpose vehicle.
